citeinfo.origin: Broward / David Stout, Environmental Planning and Community Resilience Division, Broward County Government
citeinfo.title: ShoreProtectionProjects

descript.abstract: This data contains 62 polygons showing the location of beach nourishment, dune restoration, coastal structures, sand bypassing and sand backpassing projects in Palm Beach, Broward, and Miami-Dade Counties.
descript.purpose: This feature class was created to show the locations of the large-scale shoreline protection projects along the Atlantic Ocean shoreline in Palm Beach, Broward, and Miami-Dade Counties. These data were developed by the Broward County Environmental Planning Community Resilience Division and the Shoreline Resilience Working Group as a planning tool to identify potential sites to construct new dune restoration projects. This feature class is to be used with the CoastalDunes2013 featue class for planning purpuses only.

timeperd.current: Mapping work was finalized in February 2015

theme.themekey: Coastal Resilisency, Shoreline Resilsency, Living Shorelines, Shore Protection Projects

place.placekey: Southeast Florida, Palm Beach County, Broward County, Miami-Dade County

enttyp.enttypd: Large-scale Shore Protectis in Palm Beach, Broward, and Miami-Dade Counties.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Title or name of the Shore Protection Project.
Type of Shore Protection Project. 5 types were identified: Beach Nourishment, Dune Restoration, Structures, Bypassing and Backpassing.
Lable identifer for map output and printing. The Label gives the location and type of project.
Florida Department of Environmenatal Protection or U.S. Army Corps of Engineers Permit Number.
Date of project construction.
Origin of sand source for Beach Renourishment and Dune Restoration projects
Volume of fill placed for the Beach Nourishment projects, This information came from permit appications and reports.
Project owners name.
Project owners address.
Entity that was responsible for building the project.
Project cost.
Identifies whether dune plants were installed as part of the project design.
Common names of plants installed.
Common names of plants installed.
Common names of plants installed.
Common names of plants installed.
Originators comments.
Originators comments.
The Florida Department of Environmental Protection Control Monument at the northern limits of the project.
The Florida Department of Environmental Protection Control Monument at the southern limits of the project.
Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: County where the project is loccated.
Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
